projects.title: Secure Architecture
projects.description: A project involving 8 students that required the total reconstruction of an IS on an ESXi. Implementation of numerous assets: Active Directory, PdT, IAM, Logger, Back-Up, Risk Analysis, Flow Matrix, Firewalls, etc.

projects.title: Cyber Note Block
projects.subtitle: Notion
projects.description: Notes and documentation dedicated to cybersecurity, including basics of GRC, privilege escalation on Linux and Windows, Active Directory attack, and over 60 CTF challenge walkthroughs.

projects.title: GDPR Application
projects.description: Creation of a privacy policy, data forms, and a privacy impact assessment for a fictional company analyzing CO2 emissions from individuals.

projects.title: OPCI - Encryption Software
projects.subtitle: Python AES/RSA - Azure - ElectronJS
projects.description: To allow the transfer of confidential files within a company, we developed an end-to-end encrypted file sharing software solution.

projects.title: Tree Commerce
projects.subtitle: React - TailwindCSS - MongoDB - Express
projects.description: “How can we develop a new perspective on ecology?”. That’s how we came up with this idea: making trees the stars of our site. Ally Trees and Fashion.

projects.title: Medicinery
projects.subtitle: React Native - Django - MSSQL
projects.description: An application to make instructions and general information about medicines accessible.
